lenders.name: Group Funds
lenders.loan_because:
UPDATE:  Due to  the recent tragedy in Haiti, Gene's daughters have decided to withdraw 60% of the group funds to help send relief to the people of Haiti.  Because of Gene's compassion for the innocence of children, his daughters have chosen Save the Children to receive this charitable donation.  The girls have also decided to matched the funds withdrawn from Kiva to make a total donation of $1,600.  
Gene's daughters will continue loaning funds through Kiva .org indefinitely and hope to rebuild and grow the account in the near future.
lenders.occupational_info: Save the Children is not only providing and distributing the basics to the people and children of Haiti, they are setting up Child Friendly Spaces planned for shelters and camps housing earthquake victims.  These safe spaces protect children and give them a place to play and recover from the suffering they have endured and witnessed.

lenders.occupational_info:
I have a small store front in Hawaii where tourist buy the jewelry and household souvenir  items   as keepsakes.  I teach other business owners how to create and package saleable goods.  It gives me great pleasure to be able to help others to create sustainability through the opportunity offered by Kiva micro -finance.
I sell used books at on line and use the money to fund my kiva loans.
I am proud of the groups that I have assisted so far and thanks to my sales, and my Running for "Change" there are many more to come.

lenders.occupational_info: I am brought in to someone's home and asked to style and decorate it with luxury furniture, art, accessories, rugs, and linens. I purchase these items from different vendors and have some of the items custom made. I then deliver and place them in my clients home. Many times clients want to undergo construction to add space to their house or they want to remodel rooms to make them nicer. I also oversee this process and oversee the laborers to complete the job.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I may be poor in the US, but I'm spoiled compared to most everyone else on this little planet.

Anyone who works hard and strives to be a better person deserves my support if I can lend it.
lenders.occupational_info:
I look at cars for banks. Lots and lots of cars.

The bank owns the cars and loans them to dealers. I make sure the cars are where they are supposed to be. I also look at the cars when people have finished leasing them, and then help sell them to new people.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I believe business can be a vehicle for social change

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have it. It is my prayer that one day someone else will be the lender and not the  borrower because of my contributions.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children, however that is my service. My work is to praise God and to be a Christian! Be Blessed!!

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help you create your own happiness
lenders.occupational_info: I look at how my company spends and makes money.

lenders.name: Barbara & Mario
lenders.occupation: Health Education and Disease Prevention Research
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's microloaning program is a great way to plant seeds of economic freedom in families around the world
lenders.occupational_info: Barbara teaches HIV prevention and Mario works in public health doing research and evaluation of chronic diseases like cancer and heart disease.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and change the world! We have a choice to help make it a little easier for others, so let's do it.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Our generation of hope, pioneered by technologies such as kiva, is enabling individuals from vastly different circumstances to realize their interdependence, to empower one another, and to bond as friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to suck the marrow out of life. I believe that the better off my fellow neighbor is, the better off I will be. I enjoy life. I have a stake in this world. I am responsible but take no credit.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: members of my Sunday School class told me about the program and it sounded so rewarding.   I am also going to have my sons begin to lend money so they can learn the value of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in training and outreach on programs for the elderly and disabled adults and children to help them stay at home and receive care at home.

lenders.name: Mona
lenders.loan_because: When I saw an ad for Kiva I didn't see how I couldn't give a $25 loan! Now I have been paid back and am giving out the same money again! It's so great that I will be able to help people over and over with the same $25
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant. When somebody comes in to eat I suggest items they might like and help them choose from our very large wine and drink list. Then I relay their order to the kitchen and/or bar who makes the food and drinks. I talk with the tables, make sure they have all they need and also process their credit card or cash before they leave.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I've needed a leg up in my time.
lenders.occupational_info: I design commercial and residential fire sprinkler systems to protect life and property.

lenders.name: Raghu
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a job

lenders.name: Socient
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place and to give the opportunity to everyone to create wealth
lenders.occupational_info: We provide marketing platforms for individuals and organizations to promote and share ideas, products, and services.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to help!

lenders.name: kara
lenders.loan_because: People deserve it.
lenders.occupational_info: At my work, I try to be kind, helpful and informative, facilitating people's navigation through the very convoluted world of American health insurance.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am extremely grateful for the opportunities presented to me in life and want to directly and positively impact the world around me by helping to create opportunities for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an in-house corporate attorney for a socially-responsible biopharmaceutical company, and, believe it or not, I love my job!

lenders.name: Hege&Espen
lenders.loan_because: We want to give hard working people around the world a chance to reach their goals!
lenders.occupational_info: Hege is employed as an accounting consultant. Espen is working within the computer software business.

lenders.name: Rahel
lenders.loan_because: ...having spent many years in low-paying jobs, I know the frustrations of poverty, and want to help others who are motivated to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations communicate better with their audiences.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a political science student who hopes to study economic development.

lenders.name: Kemmeo and Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And as a first generation American (Brazilian family) I've been back and seen poverty first hand and realize how little it takes to make a difference in the third world.  We don't have much but we do what we can, because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer, a daughter, a wife, and a mother.

lenders.name: Olina
lenders.loan_because: Even if  I am not a rich girl, I know more and more people stay poor with heavy burden and strong desire to become economically independent.  I hope my little donation will be helpful to others to improve their lives and make a better future for their families and children.
lenders.occupational_info: an average office lady

lenders.name: Duke
lenders.loan_because: simply want to help to alleviate the poor, bring some hopes to others so they can do the same to other's others
lenders.occupational_info: Service peoples looking for entertain, relax after long day works.

lenders.name: Stephane
lenders.loan_because: there is more than beautiful flowers in The Netherlands: people are friendly, open, generous and willing to help other countries. I believe we can help a lot if we understand well the needs of other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies to use new computer systems. It seems technical but it is very human: a lot of people are afraid of change and you have to help them in adapting to the new situation: the new system.

lenders.name: Ronel
lenders.loan_because: I started a pay-roll company in South Africa. There are so many underprivileged people in my beautiful country. They have drive, determination and such wonderful spirits, but not the resources to really get going. I want to try and assist them to build something for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: The pay-roll company is internet based and with very little training a person can do a whole companies completed pay-roll, as you buy software packages that does all the calculations for you.
